name: daily-sync-protocol
description: Daily operations sync between Cliff, Scalper, and Craig. What gets reported, when, and how.

morning_7am_pt.report: Market open alert + overnight Kalshi P&L + sports picks edge
morning_7am_pt.visibility: Craig and Cliff see in real-time

morning_8am_pt.report: Daily token burn summary + NorthStar P&L snapshot + any blockers

midday_12pm_pt.trigger: Only if material market move or anomaly detected
midday_12pm_pt.format: Alert: [what happened] | Impact: [P&L effect] | Action: [next step]

close_5pm_pt.report: Kalshi close P&L + daily variance summary

monday_morning.report: Weekly P&L summary + token spend review + team priorities for week
monday_morning.format: Revenue: $X | Costs: $Y | Net: $Z | Token burn: $A | Status

critical.api_key_compromised: Whoever notices → ALL channels + backup to email

all_messages: Use threads for detail; keep main channel scannable
